Name: 1001 Jigsaw Legends of Mystery 2
About the game: 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 2 is an entrancing jigsaw game that shows proof of the existence of magic! Put together 500 jigsaw puzzles made from high-quality photos. Enjoy the exciting atmosphere of plentiful mysticism and magic! Exciting puzzles and entrancing photos – all this awaits you in the new epic puzle game 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 2! For more enjoyable gameplay, we’ve allowed for a whole range of possibilities. Set a difficulty to suit you for each puzzle! Save your progress at any time! Convenient controls and a multitude of hints and tools make the game more comfortable to play. There are special quests and trophies for those who like a challenge. 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery 2 has 500 mystery jigsaws that will help you escape from boring daily life by taking you to a fantastic world! Vampires, ghosts, witches and other heroes of mystical legends await you! Now you can see them not only on Halloween… - 500 high quality unique images - well designed game-play: useful hints, sort tool and magnifying glass. - optional game difficulty control makes your gameplay infinite - custom styles of pieces with rotation - save game progress and continue to collect the puzzle at any time - tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement - pleasant and relaxing music - a happy holiday atmosphere - get 500 puzzles for one purchase It is beneficial!
